content.label:
For people saying that you can not beat the dragon because your fire balls don’t do any damage your wrong!😂 You can easily beat the dragon by stomping on it head not shooting it!.
Also the game is a bit laggy at times so for the developers make the game free with in app currency and change it up not game wise but how it runs Thankyou!
I’m on the level with the dragon and I can’t get past it. It seems like there’s some sort of glitch because no matter how much I shoot it the level just runs out of time and doesn’t advance.
Yo love this game y’all needa come back and update it for new gen iPhones like the x and 11 and pro max edition screens

Wanted to love it but its just not enjoyable.
Everything just feels tight and bad. You constantly hit your head and plunge to your death because of the blocks and character size. Jumps are horrible. Maybe thats how the game originally was but its no fun. Hate how it jumps continuously when you hold jump button it causes deaths as well. And wall bugs are still there. Levels are very short but there is A lot of them but its all the same very redundant. If your looking to remember how games were back then i can recommend. All in all Giana sisters is decent but i recommend the remake Giana sisters twisted dreams its eye and ear candy for miles beautiful game with interesting mechanics where you change the ... youtube it trust me! Now if we could get that game on here thatd b sick!
Level 7-7. Enough said.

Fun at first but gets kind of boring after awhile;  a bit repetitive.  Finding platformers on iOS that are worth your awhile are few and far between.  Rely on a console to meet your needs rather than apps.
The game is much more fluid with its animations and movements. The wall bug is gone now. The game looks like it got a much needed makeover, no problems to be found. Good job.

My husband is thrilled this game is on Apple TV.  It was one of his favorites on his old C64.  However--it is not without glitches.  Most annoying--during the level intro screens, the music abruptly cuts off.  Hope this gets fixed soon.

This game has 2 major glitches... Every time I get in the bubble gum ball, as soon as it gets to the top of my screen, the game crashes. 
The second glitch, on two of the boards, if I lost a life, it would take me to the beginning of the screen but lost 2 lives instead of 1!!!
I'd give it 5 stars otherwise! But at the moment I'm stuck at a level and can't use the bubble because the game crashes. 
I'm stuck at world 4, level 3!
Please help!
I LOVE this game, but I got to 6-8 and can no longer play. As soon as I move, it crashes. Please fix! I'd give it five stars if it's fixed.
It is a good game, but with the new update, I can no longer play ANY levels. The app crashes before I can do so.
Game crashes about 15 seconds into level 7-8 every time.
I purchased the DLC for level pack and it freezes the screen and wont let me click once I finish all the levels on the island.

title.label: Ohhh no.... what did you do..???  (Updated again)

content.label:
Update 5: Version 2.2.1, performance is still garbage compared to 1.x.  Been recycling the same accurate review for 14 months now, shocked you guys even bother to update.

Same ol' review with present day revisions: Version 2.2.1, same. Absolutely terrible support, performs nothing at all like the 1.x.x versions. Or the 2009 Nintendo DS game for that matter.

Frame rate issues, animations and loading screens/transitions are rough, and upon closer inspection graphical artifacts exist such as lines/gaps between sprites (see 1st retro level for example.)

Versions 1.x played flawlessly on my iPhone 5; 2.x has just been unplayable for me (under iOS 6, 7, and now 8.)

Really don't see the point of these updates if all they do is break what used to work.  Clearly this wasn't ready to be updated and yet you release it anyway, unoptimized and untested; this is greatly concerning to me. I had hopes it would improve, but 14 months later I'm convinced you really just don't care. Not a good game plan for success.
There is very very problems...

title.label: Tons of fun but glitches ruin it.

content.label: I love to give this app five stars but there are a couple of things that keep me from doing that. One the transition from level to level requires that you go to a map and select the level you want. Which sort of brings me to my primary complaint which is if you play a level and you decide to go back to replay the map gets frozen and you wind up getting stuck. The only way to fix this is if you beat the level that you were currently on. The only way I can do that is by playing it over and over but with the map frozen I can't do that. I can only play the level one time and then after I die I can't select anything. Really frustrating please fix this
Please add moga controller support!
I payed $1.99 for this app and it doesn't even work. I would like a refund.

I prefer the older version as far as the loading screen, the graphics, and the size of the characters...the game characters seems smaller since the update...also the loading screens are plain and boring now with no animations why fix something that's not broken...plz change it back to how it was... if this is how it have to be because its optimized for the iPhone 5 screen I would rather it not be optimized for my iPhone 5...also the game has tares in the background and the attack detection for the fireballs are way off the fire doesn't even touch the enemy and the enemy dies before the fireball even touch them...please fix and I will rate the game higher...why fix something that is not broken at all...smh

title.label: Great game but still needs work

content.label:
I love the game now that you've fixed the issue with it not saving game data when it's closed out. But you still need to work on some things... 

Personally I don't care about the few minor visual issues like the lines in the water etc. My issue is with having to pause the game to answer my phone or something & when I come back I have to reopen the game & start the level over, usually losing the "punk Giana" which on some levels is a real pain.

Another big issue is with the maps freezing up & I constantly have to quit the game, close the app & then reopen. A few times I had to do a phone reboot for the game to work again. Also level 9-1 is all kinds of screwed up. It's very very slow & choppy. Bad enough it's unplayable. 

Fix these few things & add more levels... I'd give you 5 stars.

Here's a hint for everyone... Since you can go to any level in the game whenever you want, if you need extra lives, go to level 1-3. It's an easy level & there are close to 200 crystals to get extra lives. I would play that level over & over to stockpile extra lives lol.
Zero stars! The second most recent update rendered the game unplayable (on iPod touch 4) and wiped out all my scores/ levels. The most recent update did not fix. Thanks for ruining a great game.

It took them close to a year before they updated to the 4-inch display. Now the controls are useless. The buttons take 5-6 taps to register. I paid $5 when this first came out and now it's garbage. I wish I could get a refund for the developers ruining a good game.
We I downloaded update, it made me start all over again.  I was very far into the game.  Very upset!!!
The most recent update completely ruined the game, adding crippling hiccups and numerous glitches.
What happened?!? The previous version was fantastic and ran great! 2.0 has so many graphical glitches, horrible load times, and LAG! Please fix!

title.label: This update has ruined the GamePlay

content.label: The gameplay is now laggy and 'off' after this new update. The fireball firing is delayed. Poor update to a great game.

Yikes, what a disappointment. Don't upgrade to 2.0! I haven't run it yet on my 5th gen iPod touch, but on my 4th gen this version is filled with graphical glitching, horrendous slowdown, crashes, and quite frankly the new menu system is rather dull and boring. New high res graphics for retina displays? Well the game looks crappy on the 4th gens RETINA display.
Also what is the$1.99 Level pack? Extra levels? A sneaky way to unlock original game levels? More info please!! 
The awesome intro story and opening level? Gone.  Oh and your game progress? Say bye bye to that as well.
It appears that the game is under new management. Which seems to the root of the problem.
Thanks for breaking a already perfect game. :(
This is an easy to pick up and play kind of game that is fun and is a nice Alternative to Super Mario or Lep's World.
Needs a little work and had I known before I wouldn't have paid $5 for it. However that said its a fun game with multiple levels to challenge you.

I would love to play the game, I bought it and it was going to install but now the app just continually says waiting. It won't download. If there is anything you can tell me to help it would be appreciated and I will give you a good rating. Ridiculous you pay $5 for something that won't work and free apps work all the time.

First time I've ever played this game, nothing overt about it but the aesthetic feels '80s to me anyway. Like watching "gremlins": the pacing is slow, and the characters fantastical.... Early levels are easy (so far), not a lot of extra bells and whistles. Not the most addictive game in the app store but that's part of the charm.
GREAT game!!!   Ready for the next one.

Admittedly, I got this game because it was recommended by a few tech blogs as a viable substitute to Mario, but 3 stages into playing it, I love it on its own! The gameplay is interesting, just the right amount of challenging to keep you engaged, and it's looooong! The graphics are awesome and the enemies are fun! The L-R controls are the best I've ever had in this type of game, as well as the control you have over positioning the player. I wish I could give it 10 stars!
I'd love the game, but it has been a long time and no update to fix a crash on iPad 2 running iOS 5.0.1 -- the game force closes when tapping on the fireball button.

Used to play the original as a little kid on the family C64.  This is a great port of a great classic.  For anyone who played and love the original, this is a MUST BUY!  For anyone new, this is a awesome platformer with solid controls.
One of the best platformer in iphone.
I love this game!
So good, could use sharper looking sprites for the 4s
Download now before it jumps back up to 5$
Great game! Must buy
If you want Mario, this is better than what you are looking for.  Great graphics and good controls.  My best purchase since Angry Birds.  Definitely recommended!

Edit: After the new update to improve the controls I really have no complaints about this game at all.  Game Center would be nice, but it's hardly worth noting, and a real nitpick to bring up as far as I'm concerned.  This is my favorite iOS platformer among strong competition!  Great work devs, thanks for listening to customer feedback!

My original review:

I get what people are saying about the buttons--it could be nice to have the sensitivity area extend past the visual button spots...but if you experiment with the button placements and put them in spots that are easier for you to get to, then it becomes almost a non-issue.  But it's worth noting that it could be improved slightly by increasing the sensitivity area or allowing users to increase the size of the buttons visually as well, as with Zenonia 2, for example.

This aside, the game could use an update with multi-tasking, and perhaps some Game Center achievements would be nice.  But I still think that Giana Sisters deserves a 5-star rating.  It's probably the best Mario-style platformer for iOS.  It certainly is my favorite, along with Bounce On 2 (can't choose one over the other).  

What this game has, is a great visual style that feels retro and also fresh and polished at the same time, great music as well.  Wonderful gameplay, and strong level design are featured as well.  If you're looking for something close to that great Super Mario Bros. feel with tons of polish and great gameplay, this is it.  Well worth $5.

When I first saw this game I thought, " it looks fun, but too expensive..." so I bought it when it was on sale. Well lemme tell ya, I would have bought it at full price. This is a fantastic game, great graphics, great game play, the only thing wrong with it is I wish there was another one!

I have to say, this is my favorite platformer on iOS. It's a whole lot of fun, and has a great style to it. It's not without it's faults, but that's all iOS related. 
In other words, it's in desperate need of a update! 
-Needs iOS4 multitasking.
-Maybe Retina Display graphics? That's me asking for a lot, if not too much there..! At least the icon?

Great game! I hope it will continue to receive support, and that people recognize it's greatness!
Does anyone know how to beat 6-9 ??

First of all, I somehow accidentally bought the the iPod version instead of the iPad, so I'm having to play to play scaled up for five bucks.  Secondly this game crashes every single rime I try to use the fire button.  Every. Single. Time.  So now my five dollar scaled up game is unplayable. Great.  Looks like a fun game, though.

Like others have said - this is an extremely promising game. But the jump button is really, really, really unreliable. Even standing in place and repeatedly tapping jump, it will frequently miss on both my iPad and iPhone 4. For a platformer, this is a deal breaker. I've finished every Mario and Sonic platformer, and even Giana on the Amiga (I recognize the tunes!). But I can barely get through the easiest level without the controls killing me.
this game caught my fancy and sure enough i was right this game rules

Why such a big deal with level 6-9? I didn't have any trouble. Don't press the jump button so hard. The touch pad responds to how hard you press jump. I mean, the controls are a bit tough to manage. That's why 4 out of 5 stars.
